altTitles.th: วัยมันส์จอมป่วนก๊วนนักพากย์ !

altTitles.ja: 声優かっ!

description.en:
Kino Hime is a 15 year-old girl who just started her first year in a high school for voice actors (Seiyuu) called Hiiragi Academy. She dreams of becoming the voice of the main character in one of the most popular series in Japan, "Magic Fighter Lovely Blazers". The academy is the number one school which allows students to make their voice acting debuts and also includes other departments such as general education, sports, music, acting, and art.  
  
Of course this Academy is full of celebrities, too. Two of Hime's upperclassmen are none other than the two rising idols of the group "Idol Unit AQUA".  
  
But Hime's dream is hard to fulfill. Her voice is not really suitable for a voice actress and her new classmate Kudou Senri doesn't waste time in pointing that out. Will Hime prove everybody, especially Senri, what she is capable of despite the first appearance?
description.pt-br:
Kino Hime é uma menina de 15 anos que acabou de começar seu primeiro ano em uma escola para dubladores (Seiyuu) chamada Hiiragi Academy. Ela sonha em se tornar a voz do personagem principal de uma das séries mais populares no Japão, "Magic Fighter Lovely Blazers". A academia é a escola número um, que permite aos estudantes fazerem a sua estreia na dublagem, e também inclui mais departamentos: esportes, música, atuação, e arte.

É claro que esta Academia é cheia de celebridades, também. Dois dos colegas de Hime não são outros senão os dois crescentes ídolos do grupo "Idol Unit Aqua".

Mas o sonho de Hime é difícil de se realizar. Sua voz não é realmente adequada para uma dubladora e seu novo colega de classe Kudou Senri não perde tempo em apontar isso. Hime vai provar que todos, especialmente Senri, o que ela é capaz de fazer, apesar da primeira aparição?

altTitles.en: The Werewolf Wants to Eat His Favorite Detective

altTitles.ja: オオカミは探偵を食べたい

description.en: I have no confidence that I can "wait"."Werewolf Syndrome" - The spontaneous onset of a strange disease. Those who are affected present symptoms such as attacking and devouring humans. In this world, this is merely an urban legend, but, 10 years ago, Reito's brother was killed by a werewolf. Since then he has spent his life as a lone detective in order to expose the truth behind werewolves. Under such circumstances, he meets his estranged nephew for the first time in 10 years. Reito was briefly surprised to see that Yoru, who used to be a crybaby, is now a dashing university student who towers over him. Shortly after, Yoru suggests that Reito should hire him in the detective agency...?!

Julia, who was born an orphan, was killed in exchange for falling in love with the Young Master of the Marjoram Family. But when she opened her eyes, at the same location as any other day, she was rescued by the Commander of the Imperial Army, ‘Carus’... She was hit by a curse of being unable to die, and this is now her eighth life. After realizing that she would be stuck in the loop forever if she didn't take down the Marquis, she became a servant within the Palace to utilize the Royal Family’s power to demolish the Marjoram Family in her eighth life. “Isn’t this how we’re supposed to plot revenge?”

altTitles.ja: あたし、キスした。

description.en:
[from lost-translations]  
With all the intertwines of love, entangled red strings, and perturbed hearts, Mitsui Haruka brings us eight stories that begins by taking that one intense first step.  
  
"Cosa posso fare per dare una mossa alla nostra relazione?"

altTitles.ja: ハレルヤベイビー

description.en: The successor of a yakuza family and his bodyguard who’s head over heels in love with him — the only pacifist in the wild and violent Ousaki Group is its sucessor, Touka. His bodyguard-slash-friend, Miyako, has dedicated his entire being to protecting him, but it seems he’s a tad bit overprotective…?

On the first day of school, six students felt their hearts flutter all at the very same moment in time! This is the story of each of them pursuing and being pursued out of their earnest wishes for love.

Tao Zhi, an infamous figure in Laboratory School 1, dominated the bottom rankings all year round. One day, according to rumour, Miss Tao somehow fell for the legendary academic big boss—the school’s only hope to defeat neighbouring schools, the top scorer in the college entrance exam: Jiang Qihuai. Some research revealed that the boss’s type was someone who was 1) good-natured and 2) good at studying. Those who scored less than 700 points weren’t even worth mentioning. Tao Zhi wasn’t good-natured either, so she started practicing 5 exams/3 years*, turning herself into a ruthless test-answering machine that woke up early and stayed up late to study for 2 weeks, and scored 350 points.

Tao Zhi: Look, I like you so much, how about you let this one go and let me take the test again?

How to conquer a Bking**--from 300 to 700 points--in what world does a lady as beautiful as a flower who comes from a rich family like me get looked down on, isn’t it because you’re a coward king?

*referring to a workbook that simulates 5 college exams and 3 years of school
**internet slang for someone who acts cool/like a king

altTitles.ja: あ、それポンです！

description.en:
Fluffy Mahjong(?) Comedy!

The recently enrolled high schoolers Sena and Shiori are keen on joining the Mahjong Club, belonging to their senior friends: Natsume and Komachi. However! The Mahjong Club is at risk of disbanding! ...Reason being? That no one there can play mahjong!! 
Will they be able to remember the rules of the game before the club becomes disbanded!?

altTitles.ja: アンデッドアンラック
アンデッドアンラック カラー版

description.en: Fuuko is an UNLUCKY girl that causes bad luck to anyone she touches. As she prepares to face her death, Andy, an UNDEAD who desperately wants to die appears before her! Realizing her potential, he decides to use Fuuko's power to gives himself a permanent death, but then a certain organization goes after them…

title.en: Honzuki no Gekokujou ~Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan wo Erandeiraremasen~ Dai 4-bu 「 Kizokuin no Toshokan wo Sukuitai!」

altTitles.en: Ascendance of a Bookworm ~I'll do anything to become a librarian~ Part 4 「Let's Save the Royal Academy Library!」

altTitles.ja: 本好きの下剋上～司書になるためには手段を選んでいられません～第四部 貴族院の図書館を救いたい!

altTitles.ja-ro: Honzuki no Gekokujou ~Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan wo Erandeiraremasen~ Dai 4-bu 「 Kizokuin no Toshokan wo Sukuitai!」

description.en:
As Rozemyne wakes up after almost two years she finds out that the world around her has undergone great change causing her to feel like Urashima Tarō from the Japanese fairy tale. However, there is no time for her to get acclimate to the new world as she is quickly sent off to the Royal Academy to become a true noble.   
She is presented with the difficult task of raising Ehrenfest's ranking while being surrounded by eccentric teachers and children from other duchies however she is motivated by the Royal Academy's giant library. While there are no other Archduke Candidates or members of royalty around Rozemyne commandeers the library!  
Here begins Part 4 of this biblio-fantasy as we enter the Royal Academy!

altTitles.ja: ホワイトタイガーとブラックタイガー

description.en:
White Tiger went into the woods to find a strong tiger called "Black Tiger" and met Black Tiger, the shrimp.

It's a web manga on Twitter by NITORI Sasami, the author of "Wonder Cat Kyuu-chan" (Fushigi Neko no Kyuu-chan).

altTitles.ja: 21世紀少年
二十一世紀少年

description.en:
Growing older is pretty rough and Kenji is finding out just how hard it can be as life starts wearing down on him. On top of trying to make ends meet running a convenience store he has to care for the niece that his missing sister left in his care. Memories of youth make it easier, until those memories come back to haunt him.  
Picking up directly after the events of 20th Century Boys, it seems like the world is finally out of danger, but the mystery of "Friend" still exists. As the world is threatened again, Kenji must search his memories for any clue about "Friend."
description.pt-br: Continuação da obra-prima de Naoki Urasawa, 20th Century Boys

altTitles.ja: 重いギャル
雪と墨

description.en:
Neneo was being hauled through the city for the terrible crime of murdering 50 villagers.
"I will buy you" she said. With one word, Freya, the daughter of a prestigious family, changed his fate as he was about to be beheaded. When Freya loses the battle for the throne and heads off to a remote, cold region, Neneo is ordered as her squire, and he finds himself in the company of a woman who, like himself, is scorned and pitied by the world. The two have different backgrounds and different ways of thinking, but as they confide in each other about their respective circumstances, they come to understand each other.
description.ja:
第1巻の内容紹介: SNSで発表されるや否や大反響を巻き起こした『大罪人と名家の令嬢の物語』、第1巻!!

ネネオは村人50人を殺害した大罪で、市中を引き回されていた。
「その罪人、私が買い取ります」。
斬首される彼の運命をその一言で一変させたのは、名家の令嬢であるフレイヤだった。
家督争いに敗れ極寒の僻地へと向かうフレイヤから従者を命じられたネネオは、
自分と同様に世間から蔑みと憐みを受けている彼女に気づく。
まるで生い立ちも考え方も違う2人だが、
それぞれの事情を打ち明けていく中で、お互いの理解者になっていき…。

Dai 1-kan no naiyō shōkai: SNS de happyō sa reru ya inaya dai hankyō o makiokoshita “taizainin to meika no reijō no monogatari”, dai 1-kan! 

Neneo wa murabito 50-ri o satsugai shita taizai de, shichū o hikimawasa rete ita. "Sono tsumibito, watashi ga kaitorimasu". Zanshu sa reru kare no unmei o sono hitokoto de ippen sa seta no wa, meika no reijōdearu fureiyadatta. Katoku arasoi ni yabure gokkan no hekichi e to mukau fureiya kara jūsha o meiji rareta neneo wa, jibun to dōyō ni seken kara sagesumi to 憐 Mi o ukete iru kanojo ni kidzuku. Marude oitachi mo kangaekata mo chigau 2-ridaga, sorezore no jijō o uchiakete iku naka de, otagai no rikai-sha ni natte iki….

description.en:
Down on his luck voice actor Daewon finally lands a huge role, but the only problems is… it's homoerotica! Plus, he'll have to work with Hyunsoo who came out to him as bisexual. Having to move in with the brash guy makes matters worse, when he brings up a past heartbreak. To-do list: Get through the new job, sleep in the right bed, keep my clothes on, keep HIM away!  
  
(Source: TappyToon)

altTitles.ja: ギャル嫁の秘密

description.en: Fuyuki is a beautiful and cool gal! But there's a secret side of her that she only shows in front of her husband...? A cute love comedy with a gal wife!
description.ja:
冬雪（ふゆき）は美人でクールなギャル！でも「旦那」の前だけ見せる秘密の姿があって……？SNS累計37万いいね！の可愛い「ギャル嫁」とのラブコメディ！
 
--- 
 
Fuyuyuki (Fuyuki) wa bijin de kūruna gyaru! Demo "dan'na" no mae dake miseru himitsu no sugata ga atte...? SNS ruikei 37 man ī ne! No kawaii "gyaru yome" to no rabukomedi!
description.pt-br: Fuyuki é uma linda gyaru! Mas tem um lado secreto que ela só mostra para o seu marido? Uma comédia romântica fofa com uma esposa gyaru!

altTitles.ja: MASTERキートン

description.en:
Taichi Hiraga-Keaton, who has a Japanese father and an English mother, works as an insurance op (investigator) while teaching archaeology at a university.
He is also a former instructor of survival techniques in the SAS (Special Air Service) of the British army.

Keaton's dream is to work as an archaeologist to discover the mysterious Danube civilization.

In reality, however, he spends his days doing detective work, which is always fraught with danger.

When he is thrown out into the desert, he uses his knowledge as a weapon to survive, and he uses chocolate to disable a bomb planted by terrorists.

He is supported by his daughter Yuriko, who scolds Keaton for his clumsiness, his father Taihei, who is still thriving in his old age, and his partner Daniel, an insurance investigator, while still feeling regret over his ex-wife.



---
Official Release:
- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/master-keaton)
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (cancelled)
description.es-la:
Keaton es el hijo de una mujer inglesa de noble cuna y un zoólogo japonés.Se fue a Inglaterra a la edad de cinco años con su madre después del divorcio de sus padres.

Allí aprendió arqueología en la Universidad de Oxford, donde conoció a su mujer con la que tiene una hija (Yuriko), de la que se divorciaron cinco años después.
Trabaja como operativo/detective para Lloyds de Londres donde es conocido por sus habilidades adquiridas como sargento mayor en el SAS y como veterano de la Guerra de las Malvinas, lo que le ayuda a llevar a cabo su peligrosa labor de investigador de seguros.
A pesar de trabajar para Lloyds, su sueño es excavar la antigua civilización en una cuenca del Danubio.
___
* Su título es "maestro" porque el maestro del campo de entrenamiento de SAS le dijo que no podría ser un "profesor" en su estilo de lucha pero un "maestro" en el mejor de los casos.
* El manga retrata muchas facetas de Keaton: no solo su papel como detective, sino también sus puntos de vista humanistas sobre la naturaleza, la familia y la cultura.
description.pt-br:
Taichi Hiraga-Keaton, que tem um pai japonês e uma mãe inglesa, trabalha como investigador de seguros enquanto leciona arqueologia em uma universidade. Ele também é um ex-instrutor de técnicas de sobrevivência no SAS (Serviço Aéreo Especial) do exército britânico.

O sonho de Keaton é trabalhar como arqueólogo para descobrir a misteriosa civilização do Danúbio.

Na realidade, porém, ele passa seus dias fazendo trabalho de detetive, que sempre está repleto de perigos.

Quando é jogado no deserto, ele usa seu conhecimento como uma arma para sobreviver e utiliza chocolate para desativar uma bomba plantada por terroristas.

Ele é apoiado por sua filha Yuriko, que repreende Keaton por sua falta de jeito, seu pai Taihei, que ainda está florescente em sua velhice, e seu parceiro Daniel, um investigador de seguros, enquanto ainda sente arrependimento por sua ex-esposa.

altTitles.ja: 303号室の神さま
神様です。サービスするよ
神様と陰気な少年

altTitles.en: I'm a God. I'll serve you.

altTitles.vi: Tôi là một vị thần. Tôi sẽ giúp bạn
Thần và cậu bé u ám

title.en: The Old Man Who Was Reincarnated as a Cat

altTitles.ja: ねこに転生したおじさん

description.en: An old man was hit by a truck and found himself reincarnated as a cat.

altTitles.ja: ロックマンさん

description.ar: بعد انتهاء القتال مع وايلي روكمان يخوض معركة جديدة كطبيب اسنان في العالم الحقيقي
description.en: Much time has passed since his battle with Dr. Wily, and Rockman has grown up in a peaceful world. Working as a dentist at the dental clinic opened by Dr. Right, Rockman struggles in his daily life with the allies he once fought with!

title.en: Dungeon Tou de Yadoya wo Yarou! Souzou Mahou wo Moratta Ore no Hosoude Hanjouki

altTitles.ja: ダンジョン島で宿屋をやろう! 創造魔法を貰った俺の細腕繁盛記

altTitles.en: Let's run an inn on Dungeon Island!

altTitles.zh-hk: 在迷宮島上經營旅館吧！得到創造魔法之後我的成長記

altTitles.ja-ro: Dungeon Shima de Yadoya o Yarou! Sōzō Mahō o Moratta Ore no Hosoude Hanjō-ki

altTitles.zh: 在迷宫岛上经营旅馆吧！得到创造魔法之后我的成长记

altTitles.ko: 던전 섬에서 여관을 하자! 창조 마법을 받은 나의 가냘픈 번성기

description.en:
One day, Sanada Shirou, who works for a black company, is transported to another world. Using his "creation magic", an ability he gained when transported, he opens an inn and is supposed to lead a slow life, but this other world is a little strange?! It is a world where women are overwhelmingly dominant, where women do dangerous work and battle, and men are powerless and are protected! The daily life of entertaining (in many ways) the women of this other world begins...!

---
**Links:**
- [Web Novel](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/1177354055503576578)  (JP)

A world of spicy romance that I want to see secretly and only I want to own. From the romance of the Middle Ages to the fantasy, the story that was hidden is released!
I can't stand this atmosphere...! Maybe... it's just me... okay?

altTitles.ja: 仄見える少年

description.en:
If something strange and mysterious occurs, you should go to him. They say he has psychic powers, but convincing him to actually help deal with fierce phantoms may be a challenge. 

---
A Gold Future Cup 2020 winner, this spine-tingling, horror one-shot now returns as a full series!
description.fr:
Issu d'une lignée qui fait trembler les créatures paranormales, Iori est un puissant médium capable d'exorciser les esprits malfaisants appelés "phantom". Or, ce lycéen fainéant, égoïste et désagréable ne rêve que d'une chose : une vie banale. Tout le contraire de Riku, une camarade populaire et altruiste… mais qui attire tous les phantom alentour ! Lorsqu'on assigne à Iori la protection de Riku, les deux camarades décident de collaborer pour, peut-être, changer leurs destins…

Maison d'édition FR : Kazé / Crunchyroll
description.ru: Если произойдет что-то странное и загадочное, вам следует отправиться к нему. Говорят, у него есть экстрасенсорные способности, но убедить его помочь справиться с жестокими фантомами может быть непросто.
description.es-la: Si ocurre algo extraño y misterioso, debes acudir a él. Dicen que tiene poderes psíquicos, pero convencerlo de que realmente ayude a lidiar con fantasmas feroces puede ser un desafío. ¡Ganador de la Gold Future Cup, este escalofriante one-shot de terror ahora regresa como una serie completa!

title.en: Kono Hi, "Itsuwari no Yuusha" de Aru Ore wa "Shin no Yuusha" de Aru Kare wo Party kara Tsuihou shita

altTitles.ja: この日、『偽りの勇者』である俺は『真の勇者』である彼をパーティから追放した

altTitles.en: On This Day, I, the “False Hero”, Expelled Him, the “True Hero”, From the Party.

description.en:
Foyle, bestowed with the job of the “False Hero,” followed his role and expelled his best friend from the party, who was supposed to be defeated by the awakened “True Hero.” But at death’s door, Foyle is saved by Iris, an elf girl who is the only one that knows his true self, even as a false hero.

Acknowledged by her as “My Hero,” Foyle remembers his aspiration to save people like a hero and begins to desire to do so in the shadows. The “False Hero” who has lost everything becomes the “Hero of Shadows” and decides to embark on a new adventure!

title.en: Genshiken Nidaime - The Society for the Study of Modern Visual Culture II

altTitles.ja: げんしけん 二代目

description.en:
Genshiken follows the lives of a group of college students drawn together by their shared hobbies, and the trials and adventures associated with being otaku.  
  
Genshiken Nidaime ("Second Generation") is a continuation of the previous series, with chapter numbering starting at 56.

title.en: Moto Dorei Desu ga, Oni no Dorei wo Katte Mitara Seiryoku ga Tsuyosugiru node Sutetai...

altTitles.ja: 元奴隷ですが、鬼の奴隷を買ってみたら精力が強すぎるので捨てたい……

altTitles.ja-ro: Moto Dorei Desu ga, Oni no Dorei o Katte Mitara Seiryoku ga Tsuyosugiru node Sutetai...

altTitles.en: I'm a Former Slave, but I Tried to Buy an Oni Slave Who I Later Found to Have Too Much Energy, so I Want to Throw Him Away...
I Bought a Demon Slave but It's Too Strong That I Want to Throw It Away...

altTitles.zh: 本来身为奴隶，买了鬼做奴隶结果却因为精力太旺盛了好想扔掉

description.en: It has been seven years since Sora Ono was sent to another world, where she was enslaved. Because of a clerical error, her “slave” status was revoked, and Sora walked away a free woman. Then one day, she purchases a slave...

altTitles.ja: Z マジンガー

description.en: A retelling of Mazinger Z mixed with ancient Greek mythology with a modern touch.

altTitles.ja: 異形頭さんとニンゲンちゃん

altTitles.en: The Aberrant-Headed Guy and the Human Girl

description.en: The main character who got worked to the bone as a corporate slave office lady in the current world got transported to another world, where she became the pet of aberrant head-san. Although they both hold romantic feelings towards each other, it's hard for them to develop their love with their difference in species standing in the way.
description.uk: Наша головна героїня, втомлена життям корпоративного раба, потрапляє в інший світ і живе як домашня тваринка Гетероморфної Голови-сана. Вони обоє мають романтичні почуття одне до одного, які, втім, через расові відмінності не можуть розвиватися, хоча...

title.en: Kono Setsugen de Kimi ga Zutto Waratte Irareru you ni

altTitles.ja: この雪原で君がずっと笑っていられるように

altTitles.en: May This Snowfield Keep You Smiling All the Time

altTitles.ja-ro: Kono Setsugen de Kimi ga Zutto Waratteirareru You ni

description.en:
"You've escaped from all your suffering, so I'll make sure you know happiness for the rest of your life."

Shiroshika Muku's childhood ended ten years ago when her father died, her best friend moved to Tokyo, and she, together with her mom and little sister, had to go to live with her grandparents. Trying to fulfill the role her father left behind, Muku, a now 21-year-old woman, feels like drowning. 

She needs to care of her grandfather, who has dementia, and find a new job after the company she started working for after graduating high school went bankrupt, so she can pay her grandfather's medical expenses and the school expenses of her little sister. She also needs to help her mother with the housework and listen to how her grandmother tells her she is not good enough simply because she is a woman, as well as the importance of having a man around.

She needs to run away and live her life for herself before she starts hating the family she loves so much, but with nowhere to go, this seems impossible. That is, until her childhood friend Yuto returns after ten years, on a snowy day...

title.en: Kindaichi Shounen no Jikenbo - Short File Series

altTitles.ja: 「金田一少年の事件簿」短編集

altTitles.en: Challenges of Young Kindaichi - Collected Special Short Files

altTitles.ja: 金田一少年の事件簿 短編集

description.en:
Collections of special short stories where, once again, Kindaichi and Miyuki are caught up in various crimes and obliged to solve them. The individual mysteries span from two to four chapters.  
  
Serialized in Kodansha's Weekly Shounen Magazine from 1997-2000.

altTitles.ja: ゆるゆり

description.en: Four mischievous girls illegally occupy the former Traditional Tea Ceremony clubroom, in order to create the "Amusement Club." These scamps…who ignore repeated warnings—in direct rebellion with the righteous directives of the Student Council—decide to remain in the room until they finally get off their bums and do something! In this slightly sluggish manga, full of fits and starts, the four girls set off from their homes for a walk together with days full of a little this and that!
description.pt-br: Quatro garotas travessas ocupam ilegalmente a antiga sala do clube da Cerimônia Tradicional do Chá para criar o "Clube de Diversão". Essas atentadas... que ignoram repetidos avisos - em rebelião direta às justas diretrizes do Conselho Estudantil - decidem permanecer na sala até que finalmente se levantem e façam alguma coisa! Neste mangá um pouco lento, como o título sugere, cheio de trancos e barrancos, as quatro meninas saem de suas casas para passear juntas, com dias cheios dum pouco disso e daquilo!

title.en: Kunigei - Okuni University Art Department Film Program

altTitles.ja: クニゲイ〜大國大学藝術学部映画学科〜

altTitles.ja-ro: Kunigei - Ookuni Daigaku Geijutsu Gakubu Eiga Gakka

description.en:
Daisuke Kanami has enrolled in the film department of an art college.

He had won a film award when he was in high school, and was filled with anticipation for his promising youth, but he was shocked by his classmate Kado Osawa, who is overflowing with talent...!?

Aspire to be a famous director! A modern story of youth in film school
description.ja:
美術大学の映画学科に入学した、加々美大助。

高校生の頃、とある映画賞を受賞した過去があり、前途洋々な青春に期待に膨らませていたが、才能に溢れる同級生・大澤門に衝撃を受けるのだが...!?

altTitles.ja: スローループ

description.en:
When Hiyori - a young girl whose deceased father taught her the joys of fishing - headed out to sea for some alone time, she never thought that she would encounter another girl there.  
After a while, this girl - named Koharu - and her end up fishing and cooking together, and they get to know each other a bit in the meantime. During their brief time together Koharu finds out that the reason that Hiyori went out to sea that day was because she's hesitant towards meeting her new stepfamily that same evening. But what a coincidence! Koharu is also meeting her new family tonight! "No. It can't be a coincidence…" Follow these two 'sisters' and their new life together!  


---
description.ru: Хиори любит ловить рыбу с берега. Этому научил ее отец. Однажды на пляже она знакомится с Кохару, своей сводной сестрой от нового брака матери Хиори.

altTitles.ja: 時森さんが無防備です!!

altTitles.th: คุณโทคิโมริไม่ระวังตัวเลยครับ!!

description.en: Tokimori-san is a beautiful and successful woman. But when she's off the job, she tends to be a bit absent-minded! Living together with the charming Tokimori-san always makes me nervous!
description.ja: 美人で仕事がデキる時森さん。でもオフのときは、ちょっとみだれがちで！？艶かしい時森さんとの同居生活に、僕はいつもドキドキさせられる—！！

title.en: Mahou Shoujo ni Akogarete - Moshi Mahou Shoujo ni Narete no Zokuhen (Doujinshi)

altTitles.en: Gushing over Magical Girls - If I Could Become a Magical Girl (Sequel)

altTitles.ja: 魔法少女にあこがれて - もし魔法少女になれての続編

altTitles.zh-hk: 憧憬成為魔法少女 - 如果成為魔法少女續篇

altTitles.en: Looking up to Magical Girls - If I Could Become a Magical Girl (Sequel)

altTitles.ja: 闇金ウシジマくん

description.en:
During the past decades, Japan has become the shining star of Asia, with its noteworthy achievements in the fields of science, technology, medicine, quality of life, and many others.

Yet, while there are a great number of rich and successful Japanese people, there are even more of those engaged in a furious struggle for something as simple as earning to cover their day-to-day living expenses; all the while battling dangerous and money-consuming addictions such as gambling and alcoholism.

What would these poor and not-so people do when they require the money to fulfill their never-ending desires, the desires that are part and parcel of being human? Just how miserable and dangerous might their lives become were they to fall into traps laid by *yamikin*, the loan sharks of the Japanese financial world's dark side, whose only goal is to ensnare such weak-willed souls?

Adapted into film and a J-Drama.

---  
- **Won the 56th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2011**
- **Won the 23rd Japan Media Arts Festival Social Impact Award in 2020**

altTitles.ja: がばい -佐賀のがばいばあちゃん-
がばい佐賀のがばいばあちゃん

altTitles.en: The Story of my Wonderful [Gabai] Grandmother

description.en: This is the story of a young boy, after being sent from Hiroshima to Saga (10 years after the second World War, in 1958) by his mom because of a lack of money, journeying to a faraway place, and living in conditions alien to him, definitely makes him miss home. Worse, he is not familiar with his grandmother and her ways too. But with his Gabai Granny, he will slowly discover with his growing pains, just how resourceful Granny is…

altTitles.es-la: El camino a casa después de la escuela

altTitles.ja: 放課後帰宅びより

altTitles.pt-br: Viagem para casa depois da escola

description.en: Shun was invited to the Going-Home Club by Naoki Satou, also known as "Chokki-chan". Despite refusing, he ends up being somewhat forcefully involved in the club's activities! A Going Home Club rom-com featuring a detour-loving high school girl and a new high school student who has lost his dream.
description.ja:
佐藤直希こと“直帰ちゃん”から帰宅部に勧誘された瞬。断ったのに、半ば強引な形で活動に参加させられるハメに！ 寄り道大好き女子高生と夢を失った新入生が紡ぐ帰宅部ラブコメディ！

---

Satō Naoki koto “chokki-chan” kara kitaku-bu ni kan'yū sa reta Shun. Kotowatta no ni, nakaba gōin'na katachi de katsudō ni sanka sa se rareru hame ni! Yorimichi daisuki mesukōsei to yume o ushinatta shin'nyūsei ga tsumugu kitaku-bu rabukomedi!
description.es-la: Shun fue invitado al Club de Irse a Casa por Naoki Satou, también conocida como "Chokki-chan". A pesar de negarse, acaba involucrándose a la fuerza en las actividades del club. Una comedia romántica del Club de Irse a Casa protagonizada por una chica de preparatoria amante de los desvíos y un nuevo estudiante de preparatoria que ha perdido su sueño.

altTitles.ja: 愛囚ラヴァ

description.en: In a world where people suddenly develop super-powers, those who use their abilities to do evil are held at Catastrophe Prison. Shu Ono, a guard at the prison, somehow falls in love with the strongest female prisoner, Lava! A crazy love-comedy about the forbidden relationship between guard and prisoner!
description.es-la: Un mundo en el que las personas desarrollan repentinamente habilidades diferentes. Los que utilizan sus habilidades para hacer el mal son encarcelados en una prisión de catastrófica. Shu Ono, que trabaja allí como guardia, se enamora de algún modo de la prisionera más fuerte, ¡Lava!

title.en: Fist of the North Star - Strawberry Flavor

altTitles.ja: 北斗の拳 イチゴ味

description.en:
In this *very* zany take on the dramatic series by Buronson and Tetsuo Hara, the end of the century… wasn't so bad, actually. A *very* special and brave Holy Emperor, Souther, wants to become more "involved" and to be on "friendly terms" with the noble Kenshiro & his posse. *Especially* Kenshiro. Due to his very outgoing nature, he also crashes the homes of his other buddies, often when they *especially* don't want him to show up!  
  
Join Souther as he releases his feelings in heart-throbbing, mind-bending confessions, settles complex and engrossing territorial disputes with deep and intricate consequences, enjoys the simple and introspective pleasures of a quiet dinner, and climbs the top of the rough and brutal pyramid that is the idol world - with the help of his best buddies, of course! Maybe even Kenshiro will be there - who knows!  
  
By the time it got its anime in 2015, *Strawberry Flavor* had sold over 1 million copies in Japan. The anime was composed of 2-minute long, abridged adaptations of select chapters from the first three volumes. They were placed after the main episodes of *DD Fist of the North Star* season 2.  
  
Every volume also contains at least one *gaiden* (side story). These gaiden are drawn in Yukito's (the elder sister of Yukito Imouto) normal artstyle, and expand on characters who did not receive gaiden during the Hokuto Gaiden period in the late 2000's.  
  
Gaiden List:  
Volume 1: Spade, Club & Diamond, Heart  
Volume 2: Souther  
Volume 3: Shuren & Huey  
Volume 4: Fudo  
Volume 5: Yuda  
Volume 6: Shin  
Volume 7: Falco & friends, Ein  
Volume 8: Ogai  
Volume 9: Devil Rebirth

altTitles.ja: 怪異と乙女と神隠し

description.en: Mysterious incidents in a city, one after the other. A demonic being is challenged to resolve them. Sumireko, seemingly a plain store clerk, aspires to be a novelist and rocks an alluring body with some ardent admirers. Adashino, an admirer who looks like a boy, is a bookstore clerk. He's steeped in mystery however, at first, until the path of challenges is revealed that he and his sister must face in the city in order to win their ticket back home, outside this world. A story of modern mysteries and romantic aspirations begins.
description.ru: Ряд загадочных инцидентов начинают происходить в городе. И всё бы ничего если этот город не был домом для Сумиреко, красивой девушки с писательским стремлением. Какие же происшествия будут ждать Сумиреко и её коллегу по работе, Адашино, полного загадок парня, работающего в книжном?

altTitles.ja: AIの遺電子

description.en:
Humanity's dream…   
Crystal humanoid technology. They have 'illnesses' just like humans but the treatment options are quite different.  
  
The troubled AI's band together, and the new doctor at the facility, Sudou, bears witness.

altTitles.ja: マウントセレブ金田さん

description.en: Mochiko Kaneda (commonly known as Kaneda-san), a self-important, clumsy sanpaku-eyed celebrity lady, climbs to the top with overwhelming financial power!!

altTitles.ja: 雨と君と

description.en: On a rainy summer evening, a woman and a "dog" happened to meet each other and life has never been the same since.
description.ja: 雨の降る日に、１人と１匹は出会いました。“あともうちょっと”がほっこり尊いと話題です。
description.ru: В один дождливый день она подобрала что-то похожее на собаку... Давайте же посмотрим, насколько хитрой может быть эта "собака"...

description.en:
The law is flawed and I'll be the one who will make it perfect. Blame the law that released you.  
  
Art done by the creator of [HIVE](https://www.webtoons.com/en/thriller/hive/list?title_no=65).
  
[Official Trad. Chinese](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/feifazhengyi/list?title_no=1434&page=1)  
 [Official Thai](https://www.webtoons.com/th/action/vigilante/list?title_no=1488&page=1)
description.pt-br: A lei é falha e serei eu quem a tornará perfeita. Culpe a lei que te soltou.

title.en: Doukyonin no Sano-kun wa Tada no Yuunou na Tantou Henshuu desu

altTitles.ja: 同居人の佐野くんはただの有能な担当編集です

altTitles.en: My Housemate Sano-kun Is Just My Editor!
My Capable Editor and Housemate, Sano-kun.

description.en:
Shinomiya Teiichiro is a prolific, workaholic novelist who is too consumed with writing to take care of himself. To prevent him from neglecting his well-being, his editor, Sano Satoru, moves in with him. But when the calm and collected Shinomiya finds himself flustered by Sano's constant presence and good looks, he begins to question their relationship. After all, Sano is just his editor, isn't he?!
(Source: MangaUP!)

title.en: The Tiger Won't Eat the Dragon Yet.

altTitles.ja: 虎は龍をまだ喰べない。

altTitles.ja-ro: Tora wa Ryuu wo Mada Tabenai

description.en:
In a distant place, on a certain mountain, a young dragon has been captured by a beautiful female tiger. The two, who were predator and prey, begin a journey to find a way for two animals with very different life spans to live by each other's sides.

TL;DR: Tiger Woman x Dragon Boy

altTitles.ja: 雨と君と

description.en:
On one rainy day, she had picked something that looked like a dog… Let's see how tricky a dog it can be…

[Official LINE stickers from author](https://store.line.me/stickershop/author/1578164/en)

title.en: I Became the Contract Daughter of the soon-to-be-ruined Family

altTitles.ko: 곧 망할 가문의 계약직 딸이 되었다

description.en:
I thought I had regressed from this ragged life, but why has my time-limited life remained the same?
I'm ruined... is this how I should live my life...?

"This time, I'll get adopted by a normal family, and live in comfort for the rest of my life!"

Step by step, I'm going to take revenge against the one behind my death, and I'll protect what's left of my small and precious life!

However, did I put in too much effort?

"Anisha, you're perfect."

"I'm going to make this child a future professor."

All I wanted was to survive...

"Well, somehow, you’ve passed. I'll have to adopt this brat."

I ended up with a tycoon I didn't expect.
One whose household will be massacred in a few years!

How do I know that?
Me too! I didn't want to! Know that!

But what can I do? The milk has already been spilt.
I'll just live in bliss while acting as the real daughter during my 5 years contract, then I'll leave!

However...

"...I happened to pick this up on the way home."
"Father, you're the best!"
"I know."

...Something's wrong.

"I checked this out 'myself', and inspected it 'in person'. There's nothing to be grateful for."
"Father, you're a genius!"
"I know this too."

No, well, something's REALLY wrong.

**

I became fond of this unique and strange family, but...

"The five years contract we signed,"
"Let's nullify it."

While looking straight into my eyes, dad announced the termination.

"I can help you, but you'll still die anyway."

Not only that,
But death came under my nose too.

Will I be able to survive?

title.en: Kono Bijutsubu ni wa Mondai ga Aru!

altTitles.ja-ro: Kono Bijutsubu Niwa Mondai Ga Aru!

altTitles.en: This Art Club Has a Problem!

altTitles.ru: С этим клубом точно что-то не так!

altTitles.ja: この美術部には問題がある！

description.en:
A girl with violently too much common sense, a boy whose sole ambition is to draw the perfect 2D bride, an addlebrained ghost member, and their always-sleeping president — what is *wrong* with this art club?!  
  
[Alternative Raw](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_AM01000007010000_68/)
description.ru: Это история о художественнм клубе старшей школы: о мальчике, отдающем свой талант рисованию "идеальных 2D-невест"; девочке, которая к нему неровно дышит; вечно спящем главе клуба; а также таинственной Колетт-сан и неопытной кураторше клуба. Все они странные и забавные люди, и с ними случаются странные и забавные происшествия.
